metadata.name: Sample Voice Bot Test Suite
metadata.description: Example configuration for testing voice bot interactions
metadata.author: Voice Test Team

questions.question: Hello! How are you today?
questions.intent: User should respond with a greeting and state how they feel
expectedElements: Indication of their current state or feeling
questions.sampleResponse: Hi, I'm doing well, thank you!

questions.question: What is your name?
expectedElements: Clear indication this is their name

questions.question: How can I help you today?
questions.intent: User should describe what they need assistance with
expectedElements: Description of the issue or request
Context about what they need help with
questions.sampleResponse: I need help with my account settings
